channel.title: Automated sentry gun
channel.description:
Had nothing to do, so opened metasequoia after long time and let my imagination free.
[b]Here are the results:[/b] [center][img]http://img87.imageshack.us/img87/2650/sentrygun.jpg[/img] [img]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/1773/sentrygun2.jpg[/img] [img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/926/sentrygun3.jpg[/img] [img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/4573/sentrygun4.jpg[/img] [img]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/6519/sentrygunscreen.jpg[/img][/center]
[b]NOTE:[/b] If you wish to use this model or edit it in any way, you are free to do that! Textures are included (size 32x32 pixels). Download link: http://www.mediafire.com/?j445x9fwx4ltgu2 Secondary download link: http://uppit.com/lsd8tfqezkx9/Sentry_v0.01.rar
[center]Rate or hate![/center]

item.title: Automated sentry gun
item.dc:creator: @mursanari mursanari
item.description:
@mursanari wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:17, topic:379304”]woulda been helpful if you released this earlier, could have used for my in dev zombie server as an object prop

but i like this, rep++[/quote]
Thats what i said, you should start it again, just dont let playrooney in, he gave it to his friends to release it so i had to release it and all he’s been doing from then is - reppin’

On topic:
Nice model man, textures dont look to bad except that cammo is more of a jungle or bush cammo.

Read full topic

item.description:

Welcome back!
@op nice model, alltho it could use a better texture (like ^that^)

item.title: Automated sentry gun
item.dc:creator: @pivotgamer84 pivotgamer84
item.description:
@pivotgamer84 wrote:

I smell Dwarf Multi Cannon.

Nice model idea, but as said above, the model doesnt look presentable with those textures.

Maybe use a metal texture, instead of a grass-like texture.

EDIT:

For the camo, use this texture.

Read full topic

item.title: Automated sentry gun
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:13, topic:379304”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=475152.msg3475573#msg3475573 date=1295670056]

Jagex’s platebodies aren’t very high quality in poly count, but the textures make up for it.

They don’t have texture, just color.
[/quote]
They do in High Quality.[/quote]
No they do not. They use a gay ass grain over top of the color to make it look textured. There are only 50 textures in runescape. And most of them are the trees.

Read full topic

item.title: Automated sentry gun
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:11, topic:379304”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=475152.msg3475535#msg3475535 date=1295668714]
Jagex’s platebodies aren’t very high quality in poly count, but the textures make up for it.
[/quote]
They don’t have texture, just color.[/quote]
They do in High Quality.

Read full topic

item.title: Automated sentry gun
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Eh, its ok.

Textures are bleh, don’t use them because they don’t work to well for the model. The tripod is disproportional to the model, its too spread out for its height and the size of the gun itself. Make it just a little bit smaller on X & Z. Other than that, it looks pretty good. Try to create one single texture for the whole model, or just use materials.

Read full topic

[quote=“The Arcanian, post:8, topic:379304”]What more would like for a shitty model? High res textures won’t make low end model great.
